      • csvItem

        private java.lang.String csvItem(java.lang.String item)
        Write a safe CSV item. If there are embedded commas we must surround with double quotes. If we surround with double quotes we must also escape embedded double quotes by doubling up.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Returns:
        a safe CSV item

        Overrides:
        populateCustomerChildren in class AdminCustomerMgr
        Parameters:
        parents - An array of parent customers
        recursive - When set to true the population is recursive to retrieve the whole of the child tree.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Populates the child customers of the array of parent customers passed in as a parameter.
        Parameters:

      • addChildrenToCustomer

        public void addChildrenToCustomer(int parentId,
                         AdminCustomer[] children)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The array of AdminCustomer children objects are given the parent id passed in as a parameter. Any existing child of the parent that isn't in the array, is deleted. Only the id of the children objects needs to be populated.
        Specified by:
        addChildrenToCustomer in interface AdminCustomerMgrIf
        Overrides:
        addChildrenToCustomer in class AdminCustomerMgr
        Parameters:
        parentId - ParentId set on the AdminCustomer children objects passed in as a parameter
        children - An array of AdminCustomer objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
